title: Lift Safety DAX Fifty 50 Hard Hat, Carbon Fiber Cap (Orange/Black) (HDC50C-19OC)
features: Carbon Fiber reinforced resin shell for superior impact protection
Brim grip, exclusive design provides a secure feel
Perforated Clarino synthetic leather comfort dome with molded EVA foam insert for additional shock absorbing protection to the top of head
Oversized ratcheting fitment dial to adjust size, easy to grip and use with gloves on
Meets ANSI Z89.1-2014 requirements for Type 1, Class C
description: LIFT is a new brand dedicated to redefining industrial safety gear. Inspired by our sister company EVS Sports, each LIFT product is backed by over 20 years of safety innovation integrating performance, protection, quality and style.

title: Lift your head with the best hard hat
